thread.title: RHONDA ROGERS SNIDER
thread.title_full: iDriveSafely reviewed by RHONDA ROGERS SNIDER

author: RHONDA ROGERS SNIDER
title: RHONDA ROGERS SNIDER
text: In taking this course online, it helped to better understand the best of learning. It was to the point in driving education, which made the understanding 100%. Once the test was taken and completed it was just a matter of days, before receiving my certificate in the mail.
